I am currently focused on full stack web development, systems, AGILE methodologies, digital transformation and learning new technologies to exploit them. In 2022, I rediscovered my passion for programming and earned a full stack web developer certification. I want to share my skills with you. Welcome!!

projects.title: Wonka Store
projects.description: Wonka Store was born to expand the sales of a family business. It is a candy distributor that began as a family microenterprise and currently demands to have a web page where the customer can add products to a cart, buy and also set the delivery date of the products. This app has an instant messaging system so that the administrator and the client can talk if they have any questions. This project is currently under development.

projects.title: BusPack Travel
projects.description: Buspack was the group project presented at Henry's bootcamp. It was conceived as an ecommerce of tourist packages where the client has a wide range of packages to tour Argentina, in addition to various types of filtering and a cart with a payment gateway to buy a package. Once the trip is over, you have the possibility to leave a review of the hotel, activities carried out and transportation service. On the administrator's side, you have the possibility to create, edit and delete any type of services that are in the packages, you can also create the packages in a very easy and intuitive way. It also has the possibility of 'banning' a user and/or deleting a comment if it is inappropriate.

projects.title: The Dog App
projects.description: After Henry's bootcamp I did the individual project with the theme of dog breeds. The project consists of building an App from scratch and starting to build its database and its backend and frontend. It makes a call to an API and shows all the available breeds, also has a section to create new breeds and saves them in a database. The project was completed and approved.
